Create reoperation columns for long conversion

Source: R/conv_acs.R
make_anesthes_other_cols.Rd

Create reoperation columns for long conversion

make_anesthes_other_cols(df)

Arguments

df

a data table to add the columns to

Details

First checks if the data table contains an "anesthes_other" column. If so, the column is split into 8 columns according to the regex pattern ",\s?".

Examples

x <- data.table::data.table(
anesthes_other = c("General","General, Spinal", "General, Spinal, MAC/IV Sedation", NA)
)
nsqipr:::make_anesthes_other_cols(x)
x
#>                      anesthes_other anesthes_other1 anesthes_other2
#> 1:                          General         General            <NA>
#> 2:                  General, Spinal         General          Spinal
#> 3: General, Spinal, MAC/IV Sedation         General          Spinal
#> 4:                             <NA>            <NA>            <NA>
#>    anesthes_other3 anesthes_other4 anesthes_other5 anesthes_other6
#> 1:            <NA>            <NA>            <NA>            <NA>
#> 2:            <NA>            <NA>            <NA>            <NA>
#> 3: MAC/IV Sedation            <NA>            <NA>            <NA>
#> 4:            <NA>            <NA>            <NA>            <NA>
#>    anesthes_other7 anesthes_other8
#> 1:            <NA>            <NA>
#> 2:            <NA>            <NA>
#> 3:            <NA>            <NA>
#> 4:            <NA>            <NA>
